criteria: Geographic Structures: Understanding and comparing the influence of geography on the development of Meso-American and Andean civilizations.
Political Structures: Analyzing and contrasting the political systems and forms of governance in Meso-American and Andean societies.
Economic Structures: Evaluating and comparing the economic systems, trade networks, and resource management strategies of Meso-American and Andean civilizations.
Religious Structures: Examining and contrasting the religious beliefs, practices, and their influence on Meso-American and Andean societies.
Social Structures: Comparing and contrasting the social hierarchies, roles, and organization of Meso-American and Andean civilizations.
